sentences.en: a bird with iridescent blue feathers
AT midday, the heat was so it had its own color, a pulsing, iridescent yellow.
sentences.cn: 中午时分, 逼人的热浪似乎有了自己的颜色 —— 那是一种脉动的, 闪烁着彩虹颜色的黄.

sentences.en: Broad disks of iridescent brightness swam under his lids.
sentences.cn: 闪亮的彩色光团在他的眼皮底下浮游.

sentences.en: Children enjoy blowing iridescent soap bubbles from pipes.
sentences.cn: 孩子们喜欢从管中吹出有红色的肥皂泡泡.

sentences.en: Enriched with natural mother of pearl it adds a halo of iridescent whiteness to your make - up .
sentences.cn: 富含贝天然母成分,为 妆 面增添一抹莹亮光晕.

sentences.en: Iridescent shimmer particles - look beautifully glamorous on the skin and twinkle in the light.
sentences.cn: 彩虹闪烁粒子 - 令肌肤展现魅力光采,灯光下更尽显闪烁亮泽.

sentences.en: Its body took on an iridescent sheen, and four beautiful wings sprouted from its back.
sentences.cn: 他的躯体披上了一层彩虹般的颜色, 背上长出了四片美丽的翅膀.

sentences.en: Light flashed from the iridescent feathers around its neck.
sentences.cn: 它颈上的虹彩色羽毛闪烁着光芒.

sentences.en: Polish and bright materials iridescent satin and organza.
sentences.cn: 磨光和发亮的材料,色丁和薄纱.
色彩变幻的蓝色小苍蝇

sentences.en: The corals iridescent under the surface of the clear water.
sentences.cn: 珊瑚在干净水体的表面下发出彩虹光芒.
这些闪着彩虹般颜色的大气泡很美.

sentences.en: The prelude was as iridescent as a prism in a morning room.
sentences.cn: 这个序曲就象清晨房间里的一块三棱镜一样灿烂辉煌.

sentences.en: This iridescent cloud was photographed above Boulder, Colorado last week.
sentences.cn: 这张彩虹云的照片是上周在科罗拉多州的布尔德拍的.

sentences.en: Turquoise, steel and royal blue are called the three iridescent colors.
sentences.cn: 蓝绿色, 金属色及皇家蓝色被称做三闪光色.

sentences.en: Yes, it was black too, iridescent where the back and head were dusty.
sentences.cn: 没错, 它的腹部也黑得发亮,但它的头和背有点灰暗.

trans.tran_cn: 彩虹色的，（随位置不同而）变色的，闪色的，小配件
trans.tran_en: showing colours that seem to change in different lights
